abstract: Megan Barry's election as first female Mayor of Nashville represents increasingly common alignment of socially liberal policies with business interests in Southern urban centers; California native, whose family home was hub of diverse social circle, was both leftist and pro-business during Metropolitan Council term.
lead_paragraph: It might seem contradictory, a left-leaning mayor who is also business-friendly. But in Nashville, and elsewhere in the heartland and the South, it’s becoming the new normal.

headline.main: Nashville’s Mayor-Elect Finds Path Between Liberalism and Commerce
headline.print_headline: Nashville’s Mayor-Elect Finds Path Between Liberalism and Commerce

snippet: It might seem contradictory, a left-leaning mayor who is also business-friendly. But in Nashville, and elsewhere in the heartland and the South, it’s becoming the new normal.
